topic.title: bug: images don't load after being uploaded on ZeroMe
topic.body:
Hi!

I've uploaded a ZeroMe image, and here I still don't see it. Is it OK?

1549373688_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4.body: @geekless does your site use zerome permission only to be able to open user's zerome profile?

> [geekless](#comment_57_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): Yep

Hmm... What do you think about annoying "grant access" request if someone doesn't want such functionality?) For example, on my phone, I don't want to download the whole ZeroMe to see avatars here.. Maybe a switch is some settings is possible?

> [geekless](#comment_58_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): display the user avatar

I really love how you(?) have implemented integration with ZeroUp in your blog! I think it's better. Big or optional files may be less reliable, but a person would only need to download those, unlike ZeroMe)

Do you think it would be hard to add different colors to this Zite?

Blue is nice, but I like green more, like the one on my Blog. Also, red, orange, purple come to mind.

I think it's possible to add color palettes to the settings, or even let users set the color they want (latter part I don't know how to implement, but it really should be possible...)

> [smashbuckler](#comment_10_114yCZGnUqTUcasBbAKUS6xmhQyDPC1ZXt): green colors

love the logo! =D
And color combination in nice)

1637321609_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJY.body: It has started to appear, after a while.. Don't know. I've reloaded the zite a few times then. Why would the picture be here now all of a sudden o_O
